title: Badla
writer: Oriol Paulo, Sujoy Ghosh, Raj Vasant

cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Taapsee Pannu, Amrita Singh, Tony Luke, Manav Kaul

desc: When a woman is accused of killing her lover, a renowned lawyer is hired -- but the more they try to  untangle the truth, the more convoluted it becomes.
